title: Introducing: Alexander Biggs
body:
**Alexander Biggs** popped up on my radar earlier this year, but it wasn’t until a few days ago that I really gave his tracks a proper listen, and pretty glad I did.

 With a debut single that clocked up an impressive 1/4mil streams on Spotify, it’s his latest track, _Tidal Wave_, that really sets up a project to truly believe in. Whilst the songwriting leans more toward the likes of Ben Howard and Keaton Henson, there’s a more distinctive rawness to the sound that allows it to remain firmly grounded, and all the better for it. Check out Tidal Wave below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
